name: Run For Food
description:
Seorang penyihir telah menyihir sebuah gua dekat desa menjadi penuh dengan makanan 4sehat 5sempurna. Terlihat begitu menggiurkan bukan!!!, eitss tunggu dulu, ternyata juga banyak rintangan dan ramuan berbahaya didalam sana!

Ayo bantu Mixy mengumpulkan makanan dari gua tersebut untuk desanya yang tertimpa musibah kehausan dan kelaparan!

FEATURES

★ Unreal Engine 4 engine
★ Beautifull Graphics
★ Dynamic Speed
★ More Obstacle
★ More Powerups

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

A Witch had conjured a cave near the village to be full of perfect healthy food. Looks so tantalizing isn't it !!!, eitss wait a minute, apparently there are also many obstacles and dangerous potions in there!

Come on, help Mixy collect food from the cave for his village, which was stricken by thirst and hunger!

FEATURES

★ Unreal Engine 4 engine
★ Beautifull Graphics
★ Dynamic Speed
★ More Obstacle
★ More Powerups
